snippet: Starboard Value said on Monday that it had taken a 13.3 percent stake in Office Depot, and called upon the struggling retailer to shift its strategy to one that reduces spending, focuses on smaller stores and sells noncore assets.
abstract: Starboard Value said on Monday that it had taken a 13.3 percent stake in Office Depot, and called upon the struggling retailer to shift its strategy to one that reduces spending, focuses on smaller stores and sells noncore assets.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Activist Fund Takes Aim at Office Depot
